item.title: VMware Aria Automation Orchestrator | Active Directory OUs
item.author: Dale Hassinger
item.description: How to use VMware Aria Automation Orchestrator Actions to make sure AD (Active Directory) OU (Organizational Unit) structure is in place BEFORE creating new Servers.
